snippet: Formidable obstacles remain in finding and recovering whatever is left of the Boeing 777 that vanished a month ago with its 239 passengers and crew.
abstract: Officials say formidable obstacles remain in finding and recovering whatever is left of missing Malaysia Airlines Flight 370, in light of the detection of metronomic pings that may signal the plane's flight data recorders.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Kirk Semple from Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia; Chris Buckley and Michael Forsythe from Hong Kong; and Michelle Innis from Sydney, Australia.

lead_paragraph: Formidable obstacles remain in finding and recovering whatever is left of the Boeing 777 that vanished a month ago with its 239 passengers and crew.

headline.main: Hunt for Malaysian Jet Tests Technical Limits
headline.print_headline: Hunt for Malaysian Jet Tests Technical Limits
